thread.section_title: B&H Photo-Video Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of B&H Photo-Video | www.bhphotovideo.com
thread.title: Pat Brister
thread.title_full: B&H Photo-Video reviewed by Pat Brister

author: Pat Brister
title: Pat Brister
text: I was referred to B&H Photo-Video by another party. Once on your website, I found the product, but I couldn't find any information regarding my specific use. Alex S. is one of your online customer service reps, and I found him to be very courteous and eager to help me. He answered all my questions, which led to my purchase. Your website is intuitive and easy to navigate. I'll be back...
